title: Historic Town Hall
description: Built in 1890, the Town Hall is a landmark showcasing Victorian architecture.

title: Old Mill Bridge
description: This 19th-century bridge once supported the bustling mill industry in the region.

title: Founders Park
description: A peaceful park established to commemorate the founding families of the town.

title: Liberty Clock Tower
description: The iconic clock tower has marked the hours in downtown since 1905.

title: Vintage Railway Station
description: Once a hub for travelers, the station now serves as a museum of local rail history.

title: Riverfront Trail
description: A scenic walking and biking trail running along the river, great for outdoor exercise and birdwatching.

title: St. Anne's Chapel
description: A stone chapel dating back to 1878, still used for community events and weddings.

title: Fort Heritage Site
description: Remains of an 18th-century fort that protected early settlers, with guided tours available.
